rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made for CenterPoint Request 28051 Task 32995.

There was a bug in this application where it was not recognizing the approval type of "alldeny". This was causing Change Requests that were already approved to have a status of Denied when they were upgraded from a version PRIOR to SC5.1.
To remedy this situation, the 11th line of panel set.fields of this application was changed from
if null(current.pending.groups in $L.approval) then if ($L.appr.type="all" and $L.denied.count=0) then ($L.final.status="approved")
if null(current.pending.groups in $L.approval) then if ($L.appr.type#"all" and $L.denied.count=0) then ($L.final.status="approved")
